textAfterTable: 20 Songs Customer Reviews Best Italo Disco mix on iTunes? I'd say so           by RoQnRoll Martian I haven't been able to find an Italo Disco collection on iTunes so far that has been as great as this. Though they are all remixes, the changes are slight, and the songs all retain their original feel and extended mix length unlike most of the collections I've found here that have either radio edit versions or drastically cut down "megamix" versions. It's a great collection, and coupled with the two disc World of Italo Disco compilation (I don't think it's on iTunes, I bought the actual CD set for cheap off Amazon though) you'll have a great, if somewhat incomplete, introduction to some of the essential Italo Disco. The Hard To Find Swedish Remixes.           by ThomasMagnum56 I have this 80's Italo Disco collection on a double cd on the German ZYX record label. Basically, these are the hard to find Swedish Remixes
